item.title: vRealize Log Insight : pre-classifying events for SIEM
item.description: For a project i’m currently working on we are using vRealize Log Insight as a logging and monitoring solution. One of the important requirements this customer has is the forwarding of syslog events to HP Arcsight, a SIEM solution.
